data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: I was driving down the highway, on my way to visit my uncle at his farm when I decided to pull over and take a break. I ran into the shop to grab some food and drink as I still had a few hours to go before reaching the farm. I checked the car and thought I better top up the tank before going too much further, so I drove on down to the pump. As it was a long journey and my beat up little truck was not up to the try, I hired a car and it took me a good few minutes to work out if I was driving a petrol or diesel car. Just as I was filling up, a stranger walked up to me asking for change. I thought what was the worst that could happen, so handed over the loose change I had. Very politely he thanked for my kindness, little did I know this was going to set off a chain of events I could never have imagined.
data.original_output: I was driving down the highway, on my way to visit my uncle at his farm when i decided to pull over and take a break. I ran into the shop to grab some food and drink as I still had a few hours to go before reaching the farm. I checked the car and thought i better top up the tank before going too much further, so I drove on down to the pump. As it was a long journey and my beat up little truck was not up to the try, I hired a car and it took me a good few minutes to work out if I was driving a petrol or diesel car. Just as I was filling up, a stranger walked up to me asking for change. I thought what was the worst that could happen, so handed over the loose change I had. Very politely he thanked for my kindness, little did I know this was going to set off a chain of events I could never have imagined.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: As I was preparing to send my gifts out, I walked up to the door of the post office and noticed a letter lying on the ground. It had the most beautiful stamp design on the corner, I'd never seen anything like it. I then looked closer and with sudden shock realized it was addressed to me. I took a sharp breath in and looked around to see if there was anyone I knew nearby, I was the only person there, so I quickly popped it into my bag, to open it as soon as I got home.
data.original_output: As I was preparing to send my gifts out, I walked up to the door of the post office and noticed a letter lying on the ground. It had the most beautiful stamp design on the corner, I'd never seen anything like it. I then looked closer and with sudden shock realized it was addressed to me. I took a sharp breath in and looked around to see if there was anyone i knew nearby, I was the only person there, so I quickly popped it into my bag, to open it as soon as I got home.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: The towering empire of Mrs Smith's authority was overwhelming! She was raising funds for the school again but you would think she was donating an organ they way she seeked gratification and praise from us all. If we didn't all comply with her request to sign up you know you were never going to hear the end of it. Just for an easier life, I was destined to man the teddy tombola stall.
data.original_output: The towering empire of Mrs Smith's authority was overwhelming! She was raising funds for the school again but you would think she was donating an organ they way she seeked gratification and praise from us all. If we didn't all comply with her request to sign up you know you were never going to hear the end of it. Just for an easier life, I was destined to man the teddy tombola stall.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: Some days I feel I only exist to sleep, work, eat, repeat. An endless cycle of doom and gloom, how I long for the Christmas break coming up. My final payment on the cottage in the countryside is just in reach and I can spend my days lounging around and taking in all the fresh air, freedom!

My final payment on the cottage in the countryside is just in reach and I can spend my days lounging around and taking in all the fresh air, freedom!
